Content:: Antonio "Tony" Binarelli (16 September 1940[2][3] – 12 July 2022) was an Italian magician. He was awarded the Order of Merit of the Italian Republic in the 5th class Knight.[4] Binarelli died on 12 July 2022 of an illness at a hospital in Rome, at the age of 81.[5]  This Italian biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
